title: A Clean-Eating Plan With Recipes, Shopping Lists, Menus, and More!
author: Susi May
description: A two-week healthy-eating plan featuring clean recipes and meal prep ideas.
cleaned_text: Take time to truly nourish yourself with our two-week Clean-Eating Plan. Created by registered dietitians Stephanie Clarke and Willow Jarosh of [C&J Nutrition](http://cjnutrition.com/), the plan focuses on whole, unprocessed foods: fruits, veggies, whole grains, and lean proteins — including vegetarian options. We provide easy-to-make recipes for three daily meals, plus a snack and a treat, because eating clean doesn't mean denying yourself the foods you love. [Click here for more details about the plan](https://www.popsugar.com/fitness/Clean-Eating-Plan-Details-2018-44220149). Take time to truly nourish yourself with our two-week Clean-Eating Plan.
